mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{suckillId}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON s.seckill_id = sk.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckilled}
